_comment: Should be set to the batsim executable, e.g. to a script which executes: 'docker run batsim "$@"'
Should be set to the Platform and workload files
where all output files (stdins, stderrs, csvs...) will be output. If set to 'SELF' then output on the same dir as this option file.

batsim._comment: The export filename prefix used to generate simulation output
Sets the Batsim verbosity level. Available values are : quiet, network-only, information (default), debug.

scheduler.name: fillerSched
scheduler._comment: The name of a standard scheduler or the path to a python module containing a scheduler
